Text: Personal Use HoursI feel comfortable with allocating a total of hrs for personal usage in yr to the business units In we operated aircraft a total of hrs Net the chairmans office we did hrs of personal usage Lay hrs We will not experience the down time in like we did in for major scheduled inspections so consequently additional hours could be flown above the norm without additional manpower more than we had in I estimate we could still operate at last years total hours due to the fact we still have more than our budgeted aircraft Once we have disposed of the surplus aircraft we may need to adjust the available personal use hours down slightly due to availability around business needs As long as the personal aircraft users are flexible with their time and dates I dont see a problem Personal Usage yr Baxter Causey Cordes Fastow Frevert Hannon Horton Lay Olson Pai Rice Slilling Sutton White Mark I will be in LAX Sunday through Tuesday for an internation helicopter operator conference but will be reachable through my pager if you have any other questions

Re Tax Valuations for YR Cc Steve actual savings prior to allocation was I miss calculated when I sent the memo Steven J ES AM To Gary NRON cc Subject Re Tax Valuations for YR Congratulations Gary NRON on PM To Bill CT cc Steven J ES Subject Tax Valuations for YR Bill we hit a home run this morning with HCAD They have agreed to take my reduced valuation on the Enron fleet A reduction of in taxable value This results in savings of Thats not all our allocation based on records for operations outside of the state of Texas resulted in additional savings of Total savings to our budget will be

RE Bill Richardsons use of Company plane forJose Lng ProjectSteve they now have the numbers Original Message From McVicker Maureen On Behalf Of Kean Steven J Sent Friday October PM To Fitch Gary Harris Anna Subject FW Bill Richardsons use of Company plane forJose Lng Project Gary Please get back with Neal Gerstandt regarding the cost of such a flight Thanks Original Message From Shapiro Richard Sent Friday October AM To Kean Steven J Cc Gerstandt Neal Gonzales Eric Subject Bill Richardsons use of Company plane forJose Lng Project I have talked to Neil about Bill Richardson of Kissinger McClarty using our company plane to go to Venezuela relative to our LNG projectto visit President Chavez Id recommend yes if its worth the expense to the business unit

Personal Use HoursI feel comfortable with allocating a total of hrs for personal usage in yr to the business units In we operated aircraft a total of hrs Net the chairmans office we did hrs of personal usage Lay hrs We will not experience the down time in like we did in for major scheduled inspections so consequently additional hours could be flown above the norm without additional manpower more than we had in I estimate we could still operate at last years total hours due to the fact we still have more than our budgeted aircraft Once we have disposed of the surplus aircraft we may need to adjust the available personal use hours down slightly due to availability around business needs As long as the personal aircraft users are flexible with their time and dates I dont see a problem Personal Usage yr Baxter Causey Cordes Fastow Frevert Hannon Horton Lay Olson Pai Rice Slilling Sutton White Mark I will be in LAX Sunday through Tuesday for an internation helicopter operator conference but will be reachable through my pager if you have any other questions

Gulfstream ProposalLay I have received the proposal from Gulstream and will drop it off today As you probably already know the flight from Beijing was a record first for the GV into Houston I have met and discussed the possibility of the GV replacing a B or a total fleet transition at length with John Stabler Ron Fain and Keith Jones I have prepared a spread sheet showing the affect on budget as well as our thoughts and recommendations Although the cabin size of the Global Express is larger Gulfstream is a good two years ahead of the Global in deliveries and fleet size They have overcome the mechanical problems that were experienced earlier in the program problems that the Global Express may still be facing Worldwide support and operational experience have the Gulfstream far ahead of the Global Express Bombardier is still looking forward to demonstrating their aircraft to you on your India trip in December All of us at the department stand ready to do whatever you feel necessary to support Enron into the new millennium

N Ken Lays phoneLay we are looking into the problem and hope to have the problem resolved ASAP Thanks PS Our best to you and your family this Thanksgiving Forwarded by Gary FitchHRCorpEnron on AM Keith Jones AM To Gary nron cc Ronald NRON John NRON Lyndel NRON Subject N Ken Lays phone Gary Least I forget On N the other day Mr Lay reported to Bill Reddick that when his phone RH seat rings and he answers that it disconnects on him He told Bill that this is the third time he has reported this problem I spoke personally with Bill about this We checked and there is no record of this problem reported recently we checked back to May on all three Falcon s Lyndel checked the system and there does seem to be a problem with it disconnecting if you pick it up before the third ring After the third ring it works fine That is all I know at this time Garrett Av is coming over today to check the system I know you dont like emails but I didnt want this it slip by Ive discussed this with Ron and John as well Keith
